channel.title: Comments on: New feature on multiplicity.dk
channel.description: I am multiple and various - Tomas A. Krag

item.title: By: Nate Aune
item.dc:creator: Nate Aune
item.description: You might try the MoveableType script called MTOtherBlog. You need to setup another blog (with its own blogid), but you can seamlessly integrate entries from another blog in your main blog. http://www.rayners.org/archives/000108.php
item.content:encoded: You might try the MoveableType script called MTOtherBlog. You need to setup another blog (with its own blogid), but you can seamlessly integrate entries from another blog in your main blog. http://www.rayners.org/archives/000108.php
